class_notes: You must have permission to enroll in-person.
course_description: This course will focus on plant identification in the field. Students will learn sight identification and the use of taxonomic keys. We will also discuss the natural history of plants and plant communities. This course fulfills an ENVS lab requirement. Includes a required weekend field trip.
sections:
